styles: position: fixed; bottom: 10px; left: 10px; background: #ffcc00; padding: 15px; border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: 0px 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
css: .ad-banner { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; text-align: center; } .ad-banner button { background: red; color: white; border: none; padding: 10px 15px; cursor: pointer; }
